title: Addressing problems at Port Edwards Fire Department | Video | waow.com
text: Addressing problems at Port Edwards Fire Department Weather Alert ...SPRING SNOW WILL RESULT IN A HAZARDOUS FRIDAY MORNING COMMUTE... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 1 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central, north central, and northeast Wisconsin. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 1 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Friday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The greatest snowfall rates of a half inch per hour are expected between 2 AM and 8 AM. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for Wisconsin can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. && Currently in Wausau 29°F Cloudy 33°F / 13°F 10 PM 29°F 11 PM 28°F 12 AM 27°F 1 AM 25°F 2 AM 25°F Online Poll © Copyright 2024 [Allen Media Broadcasting](https://allenmediabroadcasting.com/), 1908 Grand Ave, Wausau, WI | [Terms of Use](/site/terms.html)| [Privacy Policy](/site/privacy.html) Powered by
